Query: How to format a USB or external drive?

Top-3 Similar Questions: au_223598: How to format a USB stick
au_530616: Unable to format usb drive (udisks-error-quark, 14)
au_660847: How to format the unallocated USB drive and make it as Fat32?
Top-3 Scripts:
au_223598: sudo dd if=/dev/zero of=/dev/sdc bs=512 count=16

sudo dmesg -c > /dev/null

sudo dd if=/dev/zero of=/dev/sdc bs=1M

sudo fdisk /dev/sdc
Command (m for help): n
Select (default p): p
Partition number (1-4, default 1): 1
First sector (2048-7796735, default 2048): <return>
Last sector, +sectors or +size{K,M,G} (2048-7796735, default 7796735): <return>
Command (m for help): t
Hex code (type L to list codes): 6
Command (m for help): w

sudo mkfs.vfat /dev/sdc1

au_530616: sudo fdisk -l /dev/sdc
sudo dd if=/dev/sdc of=/dev/null bs=1m count=1
